name: Patinhos criminosos
description:
A multiplayer "couch combat" where you win by getting the amount of money necessary to escape the house before your friend.

This is a player test build, i plan to keep working on it, so please if you download it comment on the quality and things that should change

audio took from freesound, authors being : 

coins: monotraum

damage: ermgiln

victory: fupicat

font i forgot the place i put but the author is: shubert diaz
